creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
inscription: 昭和三年作 {Shōwa sannen saku} (made in 1928)
markings: red artist's seal: 温墅 {Onsho} | publisher seal: 版權所有渡邊庄三郎 {hanken shoyū Watanabe Shōzaburō} (copyright Watanabe Shōzaburō) | on back, red seal: 百五拾枚限り絶版　第百参拾貮番 {hyakugojū mai kagiri zeppan, dai hyakusanjūni ban} (limited edition of 150, number 132)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
portfolio: Untitled series, known as Three Beauties by Shunsen (Shunsen bijin sanshi 春仙美人三姿)
title: Combing Hair
